title: LeBron James’s Media Company Sells Minority Stake to Group That Includes Nike, ‘Fortnite’ Creator Epic Games
sub_head: Deal values SpringHill at $725 million; James and CEO Maverick Carter to remain largest shareholders
body:
SpringHill Co., an entertainment firm co-founded by National Basketball Association star LeBron James, is selling a minority stake to a consortium of investors that values the business at $725 million, the companies said Thursday.
The size of the stake sold to investors couldn’t be learned.
